titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2746) to amend title VI of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to give parents with low-incomes the opportunity to choose the appropriate school for their children and for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2616) to amend titles VI and X of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to improve and expand charter schools.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 105-357, by Mrs. Myrick.
Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 2746 and H.R. 2616.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 122.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 222 - 195 (Roll no. 566).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 214 - 198 (Roll no. 567).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 10/29/1997--Introduced. Sets forth the rule: (1) (closed) for the consideration of H.R. 2746 (school choice); and (2) (open) for the consideration of H.R. 2616 (charter schools).
